welcome.title: Your progress
welcome.description: This application helps you track and manage your time effectively across different projects.

featuresList.trackHours: Track hours spent on different projects
featuresList.setLimits: Set and monitor weekly hour limits
featuresList.visualize: Visualize your time usage with daily and weekly charts
featuresList.manageAllocations: Manage internal and external project allocations
featuresList.generateReports: Generate reports of your time entries

welcome.getStarted: Get started by adding your first project or logging time for existing projects.

examples.example1: I spent 2 hours on Project X yesterday working on documentation
examples.example2: Today I worked 3.5 hours on Project Y developing new features
examples.example3: I spent 4 hours on Project Z on 03/15/2024 testing the system
examples.example4: On 20th March I worked 5 hours on Project W

notSupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser

timeTracking.title: Time Tracking
timeTracking.content: Track your working hours by adding time entries. You can add entries manually or use voice recognition to log your time.

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: Create and manage projects to organize your time entries. Assign colors to projects for easy identification.

voiceEntry.title: Voice Entry
voiceEntry.content: Use voice commands to quickly add time entries. Just say what you worked on, for how long, and when.

reports.title: Reports
reports.content: View summaries of your time entries by day, week, or project to analyze your productivity.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: Customize the app to your needs, including theme preferences and language settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.workingHoursPerDayHelp: Default number of hours you work per day
settings.workingDaysPerWeekHelp: Number of days you work per week
settings.internalHoursLimitHelp: Maximum hours to spend on internal projects per week
settings.commercialHoursLimitHelp: Maximum hours to spend on commercial projects per week
settings.limitExceedsTotal: The sum of internal and commercial limits exceeds your total weekly hours
